The<br>conference addresses themes related to issues and processes of education at<br>any level, from kindergarten to lifelong learning, from formal to informal<br>education. 2014-12-02T10:59:17+00:00 2014-12-02T10:59:17+00:00 Compassion Focused Therapy for Depression https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CBTPINFEANDHE;cf9eaaee.1412 Compassion Focused Therapy for Depression<br>[image: Picture]<br>with *Prof Paul Gilbert OBE*<br>8th April 2015<br>Derby Enterprise Centre<br>We hope you can join us for this special event with the pioneer of<br>Compassion Focused Therapy, and world renowned expert in helping people<br>with depression, Prof Paul Gilbert OBE.<br><br>Compassion Focused Therapy was designed for people with high shame and<br>criticism - especially those with mood difficulties. This workshop will<br>outline some of the key issues in depression, and provide ways of working<br>with depressed clients with CFT interventions and practices. [...]
